overview.en: ZVChain is a multi-layered blockchain solutions designed for high performance, throughput rates, scalable and efficient blockchain infrastructure for enterprise use. Built on top of the Chiron consensus algorithm.TZVC is a buyback option for ZVC in Genesis staking program, users of Genesis staking program will receive  TZVC accordingly to their borrowing fees in ZVC. 9 months after the date of Mainnet launch, the Genesis miners may choose to exercise a 0.21USDT from the Foundation with 1 ZVC+  1 equivalent TZVC = 0.21 usdt.
overview.zh: ZVChain是高安全高性能的DEFI公链， 基于去中心化账户体系构建灵活的金融工具集。 TZVC 是伴随 ZVChain 创世矿工计划推出的看跌期权， 参与创世矿工计划的用户， 每参投1个ZVC即可获赠一个TZVC， 主网上线9个月后即为TZVC的到期日， 创世矿工可选择用1个ZVC + 1 个等量TZVC向基金会行使1个0 .21 USDT的看跌权利。
